title: Launcher crashes at starting
body:
Yesterday I played League and all was just fine, but today the launcher just crashes as soon as I press the "Launch" button:
The launcher just closes and the report a Bug window pops up then the launcher tries to restart, but it simply crashes again and the window is popping up again.
I closed the Launcher via taskmanager and tried again, but it still didnt worked. Then I restarted my Computer and it didnt work again.
I tried to reinstall the game, but... I think you know... It didnt work.

Thanks for your Help

replies.body: Are you running the Discord Overlay by chance?  We've been getting recent reports, and found that this may be the culprit.  If this is the case for you, disabling it should help!

Thank you, it finally worked :D
Im so happy right now{{sticker:sg-kiko}}
Hey, DrHofmann, you have discord open. Try disabling the discord overlay and then reopen the game!

I found a work-around for this. Right click the client's shortcut, go to it's files. And open the lol.launcher.admin, it'll open the legacy client's startup screen and you'll be able to access League from there.
